chapter.title: What is SteamCannon?
chapter.para: SteamCannon is a JavaEE and Ruby Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS). It provides a consistent platform for your applications regardless of the underlying public or private cloud. Your applications are deployed on mod_cluster, JBoss AS w/ TorqueBox, and PostgreSQL with unrestricted access to all APIs.
The user-facing portion of SteamCannon is a Rails application that can be run locally or in the cloud. It's used to start, stop, and configure the environments that applications are deployed to.
